title: Sobha Bookings Scraper
description: Extract booking data from Sobha Partner Portal using direct API calls. Requires authentication tokens captured from browser.

cookieHeader.title: Cookie Header
cookieHeader.description: Full Cookie header from browser. Get this from Chrome DevTools > Network tab > any 'aura' request > Headers > Cookie

auraToken.title: Aura Token
auraToken.description: Aura authentication token. Get this from Chrome DevTools > Network tab > any 'aura' request > Payload > aura.token

auraContext.title: Aura Context
auraContext.description: Aura context JSON string. Get this from Chrome DevTools > Network tab > any 'aura' request > Payload > aura.context

years.title: Years to Scrape
years.description: List of years to fetch bookings for. Default is current year.

maxResults.title: Maximum Results
maxResults.description: Maximum number of bookings to return.
